objectives.en: The aim of the course  is to provide undergraduate science students a basic knowledge of electricity and magnetism, bringing together within a single course inelectrical engineering, electric measurements, electric circuit theory, analogelectronics, and digital electronics basics. The course consists of theoretical lectures and practical value of the holding of practical classes.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on anda bakalaureusetudengitele algteadmised elektrist ja magnetismist esitades ühe kursuse raames elektrotehnika, elektrimõõtmiste, skeemiteooria, analoogelektroonika ja digitaalelektroonika põhitõed. Kursus koosneb teoreetilistest loengutest ja praktilistest näidetest.

description.et: Student must complete assigned tasks and demonstrate the results to supervisor.

grade_evaluation.et:
The grade for the course will be given out by percentage of practical works completed.
Work is individual for each student.

debt_elimination.et: It is possible to do practical work in the group that you are not assined to, but registered students are prioritised when giving out lab materials.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
